column4: I closed the thing that shows the icon of the programs that are running, like pidgin for example on the top panel.. now I don't know how to make it appear again.. does anyone can help me out?
I closed the thing that shows the icon of the programs that are running, like pidgin for example on the top panel.. now I don't know how to make it appear again.. does anyone can help me out?
the notification area. just right click on the panel and add it back
